doc.title: Lord of the Wiens
doc.plot: Touted as "Best in Show" meets "Hands on a Hardbody," this film is a documentary exploring the deep complexities and dynamics of the annual Wiener Dog (aka Dachshund) Races in Buda, TX. It takes a look at the love and interactions of people and their pets and the various kinds of families they make up, and small town America having good, clean, competitive fun - all while raising money for non-profit. It's funny and touching entertainment appropriate for all ages and types, and the real stars of the film, the Wiens, of course, steal the show!
